Constructs new error code.

@1@ Constructs error code with default value. Equivalent to {{c|error_code(0, std::system_category())}}.

@2@ Constructs error code with {{c|ec}} as the platform-dependent error code and {{c|ecat}} as the corresponding [[cpp/error/error_category|error category]].

@3@ Constructs error code from an error code enum {{c|e}}. Equivalent to {{c|make_error_code(e)}}, where {{tt|make_error_code}} is only found by [[cpp/language/adl|argument-dependent lookup]]. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_error_code_enum&lt;ErrorCodeEnum&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@4,5@ Implicitly defined copy constructor and move constructor. Initializes the error code with the contents of the {{c|other}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another error code to initialize with}}
{{par|ec|platform dependent error code to construct with}}
{{par|ecat|error category corresponding to {{c|ec}}}}
{{par|e|error code enum to construct with}}
{{par end}}
